definition[0]: to understand or explain something that is mysterious or complicated
example[0]: Detectives are still trying to unravel the mystery surrounding his death.
definition[1]: if you unravel threads, string etc, or if they unravel, they stop being twisted together
definition[2]: if a system, plan, organization etc unravels, it starts to fail
example[1]: The company started to unravel when two of the directors were arrested.
